Plot: Emma Frost's erratic behaviour has the X-Men spinning in a non-stop downward spiral. Will an unlikely union be the final straw? After secretly lying in wait for months, the new Hellfire Club makes its move!
Characters: Kitty Pryde, Scott Summers, Wolverine, Armor, Blindfold, Danger, Hank McCoy, Abigail Brand, Sebastian Shaw, Piotr Rasputin, Emma Frost
